directions: Bring chicken broth and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and broth has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes. Transfer quinoa to a bowl.
Stir walnuts and cranberries through the quinoa; add feta cheese and gently stir.
title: Quinoa with Feta, Walnuts, and Dried Cranberries
